languages.text: "Разве мог я принести тебе дар ценнее этого? Церковь наша хоть и не ходит среди ближайших друзей твоей династии, но все же {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}видела от тебя много добра{/d}. И мы будем молиться за тебя в грядущем рачении".

"What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."
languages.original_text: "Разве мог я принести тебе дар ценнее этого? Церковь наша хоть и не ходит среди ближайших друзей твоей династии, но все же {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}видела от тебя много добра{/d}. И мы будем молиться за тебя в грядущем рачении".

traits.locale_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our church may not be among your dynasty's closest friends, yet you have done it a great deal of good. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our church may not be among your dynasty's closest friends, yet you have done it a great deal of good. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “若非如此，我还能为你带来什么更有价值的礼物呢？或许我们的教会并不是你的王朝最亲密的盟友，但{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}你做的一切都值得称颂{/d}，我们愿意为你接下来的旅途祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."

traits.locale_text: “若非如此，我还能为你带来什么更有价值的礼物呢？或许我们的教会并不是你的王朝最亲密的盟友，但你做了很多善事，我们愿意为你接下来的旅途祈祷。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「どのような高価値な贈り物をさしあげましょう？我々の教会はあなたの王朝にとって、近しい仲間ではないかもしれません。ですが、{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}あなたの行いは称賛に値するもの{/d}です。あなたのこれからの活躍に、祈りを捧げます」
languages.original_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."

traits.locale_text: 「どのような高価値な贈り物をさしあげましょう？我々の教会はあなたの王朝にとって、近しい仲間ではないかもしれません。ですが、{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}あなたの行いは称賛に値するもの{/d}です。あなたのこれからの活躍に、祈りを捧げます」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «¿Qué regalo de valor podría traerle? Puede que nuestra misión no se encuentre entre los amigos más íntimos de su dinastía, pero {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}usted ha hecho mucho bien{/d}. Rezaremos por usted en su próximo esfuerzo».
languages.original_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué regalo de valor podría traerle? Puede que nuestra iglesia no se encuentre entre los amigos más íntimos de su dinastía, pero usted ha hecho mucho bien. Rezaremos por usted en su próximo esfuerzo».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Welches Geschenk von größerem Wert könnte ich Euch bringen? Unsere Mission mag nicht zu den engsten Freunden Eurer Dynastie zählen, doch {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}Eure Taten sind lobenswert{/d}. Und wir beten dafür, dass Eure Unternehmung Erfolg hat."
languages.original_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."

traits.locale_text: "Welches Geschenk von größerem Wert könnte ich Euch bringen? Unsere Kirche mag nicht zu den engsten Freunden Eurer Dynastie zählen, aber Ihr habt viel Gutes getan. Und wir beten dafür, dass Eure Unternehmung Erfolg hat."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « C'est ce que j'ai de plus précieux à vous offrir. Même si notre mission ne fait pas partie des amis proches de votre dynastie, {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}vous avez fait preuve d'une grande bonté.{/d} Nous prierons pour la réussite de votre entreprise. »
languages.original_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que j'ai de plus précieux à vous offrir. Même si notre église ne fait pas partie des amis proches de votre dynastie, vous avez fait preuve d'une grande bonté. Nous prierons pour la réussite de votre entreprise. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Sana daha değerli nasıl bir armağan getirebilirdim? Misyonumuz, hanedanlığının en yakın destekçilerinden olmayabilir ancak {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}eylemlerin takdire şayan{/d}. Gelecekteki çabalarında başarılı olman için dua edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "What gift of greater value could I bring you? Our mission may not be among your dynasty's closest confidants, yet {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}your deeds are laudable{/d}. And we will pray for you in your coming endeavour."

traits.locale_text: "Sana daha değerli nasıl bir armağan getirebilirdim? Misyonumuz, hanedanlığının en yakınlarından biri olmayabilir ancak {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}gerçekleştirdiğin eylemler takdire şayan{/d}. Gelecekteki çabalarında başarılı olman için dua edeceğiz."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
